
{{alias}}( operation )
    Returns the BLAS diagonal type string associated with a BLAS diagonal
    type enumeration constant.

    Parameters
    ----------
    operation: integer
        Operation enumeration constant.

    Returns
    -------
    out: string|null
        Operation string.

    Examples
    --------
    > var out = {{alias}}( {{alias:@stdlib/blas/base/diagonal-type-str2enum}}( 'unit' ) )
    'unit'

    See Also
    --------
